metadata.title: Webswize | Home
metadata.description: Web dev service as you like it.

slider.name: Responsive
slider.title: Responsive and Well-Organized web design
slider.description: One of our main concerns is to take care of your website's responsivness and give it the best possible design.

slider.name: Interactive
slider.title: Fully interactive web applications
slider.description: We use the best libraries and frameworks to make the website interactive to users.

slider.name: Creative
slider.title: Creative, modern and attractive design
slider.description: The creation of your website's design is crucial, we take care of that.

seo.title: Full support of search engine optimization
seo.description: Search engine optimization is very important for a website in order to appear at the top, we use SEO friendly libraries and packages to improve core web vitals, metadata and other factors that boost the ranking.

frontEndAndbackEnd.title: Works on both front-end and back-end
frontEndAndbackEnd.description: In most cases, websites require both front-end and back-end for full functionality. Based on the website's content, we make a corresponding front-end that runs on the client, and a back-end that runs on the server, if necessary, we use database and then use an API to retrieve data from it.

security.title: Secure navigation and safe credentials
security.description: We guarantee our customers that navigating on their website will be completely secure and that user information will be preserved.

workTime.title: Open to work at any time
workTime.description: As said, we're open to work, you can visit our contact page.

info.text: Welcome to Webswize - Your Partner in Web Development Excellence! At Webswize, we are more than just web developers; we are passionate creators, problem solvers, and innovators. Founded by two dedicated developers with a shared vision, we have set out to make the digital world a better place, one website at a time.

info.title: Our Story
info.text: Our journey began with a simple idea: to combine cutting-edge technology with creative design to build websites that leave a lasting impression. We united our skills to form a dynamic team that thrives on challenges and is committed to delivering outstanding results.

info.title: Our Mission
info.text: Our mission is to empower businesses and individuals by harnessing the full potential of the web. We believe that a well-crafted website can transform a mere online presence into a powerful tool for growth, communication, and success. Our clients' dreams and aspirations are at the core of everything we do.

info.title: What Sets Us Apart
list: Expertise : With years of experience in web development, we bring expertise in a wide range of technologies and frameworks, ensuring that your project is in capable hands.
Custom Solutions : We don't believe in one-size-fits-all solutions. Each project we take on is unique, and we tailor our services to meet your specific goals and needs.
Design Excellence : We understand the importance of aesthetics and user experience. Our design team ensures that your website not only functions flawlessly but also captivates your audience.
Client-Centric Approach : Your satisfaction is our priority. We maintain open lines of communication, listen to your feedback, and make sure you are involved every step of the way.

info.title: Let's Create Together
info.text: We believe in collaboration, and we're excited to embark on this journey with you. Whether you're a startup looking to establish your online presence or an established business seeking a digital transformation, we're here to make your vision a reality. Thank you for considering Webswize as your web development partner. We look forward to working with you and crafting digital experiences that truly shine. Ready to get started? Contact Us today to discuss your project!

slider.title: Dynamic websites
slider.description: Ideal for scalability, user interactions and data organization. Includes CMS and databases.

slider.title: Static websites
slider.description: Best choice for a simpler website, faster performance, faster realization and lower cost.

list.name: Front end
list.description: We use frameworks such as Reactjs and Nextjs because they are developer friendly and have a large amount of helpful packages and tools.

list.name: UI / UX design
list.description: One of the main factors of a website's ranking is it's design, we have the right tools to create beautiful and attractive user interfaces.

list.name: Back end
list.description: Back end is just as important. Nodejs and Express are present to do the job if needed.

list.name: Fixing errors
list.description: In many cases, a website may develop bugs and errors, we're here to debug and fix those errors.

list.name: Online payment
list.description: Some people prefer to pay online using credit cards, we use the right tools & libraries to add online payments and verify them.

list.name: CMS
list.description: Website contributors might want to create, edit and delete the content of his website, Content Management System is here to help him.

ai.title: AI Tools
ai.description: We have some useful AI tools that may help you.

toolList.name: AI Chatbot
toolList.description: Based on GPT 3.5, our chatbot generates answers for your questions

toolList.name: Background Remover
toolList.description: A simple and efficient AI tool for background removal
